Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2018 11:35AM Nlbress wrote: Just got home. Radiologist says the few tiny calcium deposits I have are not concerning. They want to keep an eye on them though since this was my first mammogram. They want to make sure they don't change. Will go back in 6 months. Will discuss with my gyno. Rad says she doesn't recommend biopsy, but second opinions never hurt if I am feeling anxious.
